price: Ɔsomafoͻ a ɔfiri Nyankopͻn hͻ rekenkan Nwoma a emu nsεm korogyee (kyerε wͻn).
arabic: رَسُولٞ مِّنَ ٱللَّهِ يَتۡلُواْ صُحُفٗا مُّطَهَّرَةٗ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: rasūlun mina al-lahi yatlū ṣuḥufan muṭahharatan
